snippet: Ivan DeLeon, 38, of Queens, was arrested on several charges, including assault and criminal possession of a weapon, the police said.
abstract: Ivan DeLeon of Queens is arrested on several charges, including assault, in connection with stabbing of one man and slashing of two others on subway platform at Grand Central Station.
lead_paragraph: Ivan DeLeon, 38, of Queens, was arrested on several charges, including assault and criminal possession of a weapon, the police said.

headline.main: Man Is Accused of Stabbing 3 Inside Grand Central Station
headline.print_headline: Man Is Accused of Stabbing 3 Inside Grand Central Station
